content: Hi! I love chatting about differential geometry; my work also intersects with analysis (but I'm not a geometric analyst by training).
I believe @Stefan Kebekus formalise a lot about harmonic maps already.

@Merrick Hua Welcome! As Michael points out, I formalized a few things about harmonic maps, but I wouldn't call that "a lot". I'd be more than happy to discuss these matters if you (or anyone else) is interested.
